name: Pendulumucho
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 face-up Level 1 Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck, except "Pendulumucho", but banish it when it leaves the field.
pendulum_text: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if this card was activated this turn: You can target 1 of your Pendulum Monsters, that is banished or in your GY, except "Pendulumucho"; add it to your Extra Deck face-up.
